body_content.explanation: the responsibilities of an important position or job, especially as given from the person who had the job to the person who replaces them:
examples: She unsuccessfully attempted to assume the mantle of the presidency.
He has been asked to take on the mantle of managing director in the New York office.

body_content.explanation: a layer of something that covers a surface:
examples: A thick mantle of snow lay on the ground.
We watched the building vanish under a mantle of thick smoke as the fire swiftly moved through it.

body_content.explanation: the part of the earth that surrounds the central core
in the past, a piece of clothing without sleeves that was worn over other clothes
